column5: Steelies are a little late in dropping down this yr but still managed a few. Today's bait of choice.......a pink Riverworm.
cool ! great fish and Pink seems to be a good color when it comes to fish!  That pink worm is scented?
Droppies were also interested in the non scented light pink colour.
Cool pic silverstreak Beauty trout.... thanks for sharing Leechman
Nice fish... I often forget that dropback hens will hit ANYTHING some days, that worm is huge
LOOKS HUGE BUT THERE JUST A TAD BIGGER THEN THE BERKLEY PINKIES. I REALLY PREFER THOSE RIVERWOOD WORMS WHEN THE WATER HAS TINGE OR WELL STAINED.
Not Necessarily Kemper....we fished with roe for over an hour at first light with no hits. Soon as we switched to worms and jigs we were into a few. Cheers.
I'm guessing you work for Riverwood (or really want to?)
